sentences.sContent: And those most in need of teaching are the professor, the governor of Massachusetts and President Obama.
sentences.sContent_eng: And those most in need of teaching are the professor, the governor of Massachusetts and President Obama.
sentences.sCn: 而最需要施以教导的那些人是这位教授、马萨诸塞州州长和奥巴马总统。

sentences.sContent: It then made Massachusetts the most stable state or essentially the most stable state in the country and it was widely-admired.
sentences.sContent_eng: It then made Massachusetts the most stable state or essentially the most stable state in the country and it was widely-admired.
sentences.sCn: 那时，它使马萨诸塞州成为了美国最稳定的州,或者说本质上最稳定的州,并广受好评与赞赏。

trans.tranOther: a member of a North American Indian people formerly living around Massachusetts Bay
